name: Greedy Toad!
description:
Greedy Toad is a hilarious one tap multiplayer game with a tasty twist!

Tap to jump in a direction and your toad will eat anything facing it, including players!

The more you eat, the bigger you get.

Explore a full 3D environment and be the last frog standing!

Do you have what it takes to be the king of the pond?
